name: backend
description: This project will be an ecommerce store. We will create a store to sell ___ . For this project, we will build an e-commerce full stack application that allows users to perform various CRUD operations. we will also be impementing a stripe API, to use Stripe's payment processing platform. The objectives are as follows: - Build a backend using Node.js, Postgres and Express with at least 2 tables in the database - Backend support for user authentication, including password hashing - Allow users to register and log in   - Allow CRUD on products in the online store - Allow CRUD on user accounts - Allow CRUD on user carts - Allow a user to create an order - A frontend react app that interacts with the backend - Use of a 3rd party API
author: Elias, RZ, Clement
